TestCase.CaseDescription: Inserting user with duplicate email address Expected error: Can not add due to UNIQUE constraint on email
TestCase.SQLScript: select @email := email from Users order by 1 desc limit 1; insert into Users (userId, email, firstname, lastname, password, roleId, majorId) values (UUID(), @email, 'admin', 'admin', PASSWORD('123abcd'), 1, 1);
